dataCollectionAndUsage: Savie - Grocery Tracker ("we," "us," or "our") collects and processes personal data strictly for the purpose of providing the grocery tracking services offered through this web application.
We collect personal data such as your name, email address, and any additional information you provide voluntarily during the registration or account setup process.
The personal data collected is used solely for the purpose of enabling the functionality of the Savie - Grocery Tracker app and providing the services requested by you.
dataProtectionAndSecurity: We take the privacy and security of your personal data seriously. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to safeguard your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
Your personal data is stored securely on servers with restricted access. We do not share your personal data with third parties unless required by law or with your explicit consent.
userRights: You have the right to access, rectify, restrict, or delete your personal data that we hold. You can update or modify your personal data by accessing your account settings within the Savie - Grocery Tracker app.
If you wish to exercise your rights or have any concerns regarding the processing of your personal data, please contact us using the provided contact details.
cookiesAndTrackingTechnologies: Savie - Grocery Tracker uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and improve our services. By using the app, you consent to the use of these technologies in accordance with our Cookie Policy.
thirdPartyLinks: The Savie - Grocery Tracker app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of such third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal data.
changesToDisclaimer: We reserve the right to update or modify this disclaimer from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, and we encourage you to review this disclaimer periodically.
acknowledgement: By using the Savie - Grocery Tracker app, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this disclaimer.
